name: SCIOTO VALLEY LOCAL SCHOOL DISTRICT
sampleDescriptions: SVLSD has engaged Sunday Creek Horizons, LLC to advocate for the construction of a new school building in a location that has not been contaminated by radioactive elements from the adjacent department
